histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.LogSize.OnSuccess
histogram.summary: Size in kilobytes (after compression) of an uploaded Private Metrics log. Recorded after a successful Private Metrics upload.

histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.LogUpload.Canceled.CellularConstraint
histogram.summary: Logs whether a log was not uploaded due to cellular log throttling logic. Android only.

histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.LogUpload.ResponseOrErrorCode
histogram.summary: HTTP response codes and network errors encountered by Private Metrics when attempting to upload logs to the server.

histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.PersistentLogRecall.Status
histogram.summary: The status when loading Private Metrics PersistedLogs from Prefs.

histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.ProtoCompressionRatio
histogram.summary: Compression ratio of the serialized protobuf that will be uploaded to the Private Metrics server. This serialized protobuf is compressed using gzip.

histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.UnsentLogs.DroppedSize
histogram.summary: Number of bytes in an excessively large log that was discarded while persisting Private Metrics logs to disk to retry during next chrome run.

histogram.name: PrivateMetrics.UnsentLogs.NumDropped
histogram.summary: Counter for number of Private Metrics unsent logs removed from persistent storage.
